infos.value: ...Father?
King Oelde!
N-nothing worth...your concern.
'Tis a grievous wound.
Did you not tell us that your wounds had healed, Father?
Why would you lie to us?
A foe can be deceived by feigning friendship.
That I understand. However...
You would have us turn back for Wezette Castle?
O-of course not.
Then you understand?
All we can do now is continue onward.
...Agh.
Your help is not needed.
But why...
Why must you always put on a brave front, Father?
Are we not...family?
You should trust me to help you and lift your spirits in times of need.
What foolishness.
Father...
You believe being a family means going through life licking each other's wounds?
I thought perhaps this war had imparted some wisdom unto you, but it seems my judgement was hasty.
I've no inclination to rely on someone who says such cowardly things.
Then...please tell me.
What can I do...that will make me capable in your eyes?
You feel it as well as I do... Sterne is at Leonis Castle.
He will undoubtedly try to kill me—and you as well.
Mont. When that time comes, what shall you do?
Knowing you, you shall say that you can reason with him. Am I mistaken?
He has what you lack—resolution.
He will do whatever is necessary to triumph. That is why...
I cannot best him. Is that what you mean to say?
Just so. As it stands, he could cut you down with ease.
Consider that as we continue on to Leonis Castle.
And think over what you must do.
Now move out.
